CbDescription: Discover this little gem in the Catskills. Accommodates six guests with its antique New York Dutch handmade queen size bed and two twin sofa beds. Strong Wi-Fi brings civilization to you with a smart TV and free Netflix (no cable TV). This property has all the comfort you can ask for to make a perfect getaway.

The Shawangunk Lodge is secluded, but it's not far from local shopping and restaurants. Enjoy hiking the local trails, rock climbing in the Trapps and the Gunks, hang gliding, fly fishing, and swimming and canoeing on the lake at the bottom of the pasture.

Bill's Bungalow is the perfect getaway for hikers, mountain bikers, cross-country skiers, and snowmobilers. This quonset style tiny house is far removed from any road, and no parking is provided on-site. But you can park in the nearby Walker Valley Park and Ride lot, from which it is a five minute hike up to the cabin. The cabin is located on the Middle Path trail. If you're looking to get away from it all, this is the site for you!
Looking to entertain a crowd? This enormous lodge can host you and your clan, with room to spare. Provides all the amenities, including Wi-Fi, so you can keep in touch with the rest of the world.

This wonderful old farm house is located near the entrance to Sam's Point. It's convenient to Catskills Park and located on a small lake, with several canoes provided for your use. Just hang out here and relax, or take advantage of seven nearby hiking trails, rock climbing, and local sites such as the ice caves, waterfalls, pine barrens, with 40 mile views of the Hudson Valley.

Windows lining the south side of this lovely cottage present a grand view of the beautiful Thousand Islands. Walking distance to numerous restaurants, parks, boat and kayak rentals, museums, and other attractions.
